# Sermon Transcription â€” AI-Powered Audio to Text for Churches

> Professional sermon transcription in minutes. Upload audio or video, get perfectly formatted transcripts with speaker identification and timestamps.

## About
Sermon Transcription uses AI to convert sermon audio and video recordings into clean, searchable, formatted text transcripts. Features include speaker identification, timestamps, and export in multiple formats.

## Key Features
- [Homepage](https://sermon-transcription.com/) - AI sermon transcription service
- Automatic speaker identification
- Timestamp generation
- Multiple export formats
- Fast turnaround (minutes, not days)

## Use Cases
- Churches archiving sermons as text
- Pastors reviewing and editing messages
- Ministry teams creating study guides
- Accessibility for hearing-impaired congregation members
